long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I customized our store to look like the Picture-in-Picture Extension (by Google).

The original Picture-in-Picture Extension (by Google) only works on the tab where video is currently enabled, so I modified the code to allow the Alt + P shortcut to control the activation of PIP mode on any tab.

I've been really happy with it, so I'm requesting it to be released to the webstore so that I can share it with other people.

The usage is the same as the Picture-in-Picture Extension (by Google) . However, I changed the environment where the PIP mode is played to Youtube only.

First of all, you can toggle PIP mode on and off by pressing Alt + P or clicking the extension in the Chrome browser tab where the Youtube video is playing, and you can toggle it on and off by pressing the Alt + P shortcut in other Chrome browser tabs.

This also works for tabs in a new Chrome browser, not just tabs in the same Chrome browser.

Source Code: https://github.com/VVSOGI/picture-in-picture-from-korea
